ResourceHeader.Description: 3DView is a science tool that offers immediate 3D visualization of spacecraft position and attitude, planetary ephemerides, as well as scientific data representation (observations and models). A large number of mission trajectories are included (via Spice Kernels) : Cluster, Themis, Solar Orbiter, Juice, Juno, Maven, Mars Express, Venus Express, ... 3DView can access observational database (AMDA, CDAWeb, CLweb, ...) as well as simulation and model databases (from FMI, LATMOS, SINP, ...)
